channel.title: hugo on Jontes Blog
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on Jontes Blog

item.title: Hugo
item.description: Click “Quick Start” on the image bellow for installation instructions Then open a terminal and run hugo new site sitename This will create a new folder with Hugo. Downloading a theme Now we will download a theme. This can be done here. Follow the installation guide for the theme you want. Previewing the site Run hugo server and browse to http://localhost:1313 to preview it. Customizing the config.yml Edit the file config.
